abstract: Facebook is in the crosshairs of the Dutch privacy regulator, which is investigating the social network’s revamped privacy policy to see if it complies with the country’s tough data protection rules.
snippet: Facebook is in the crosshairs of the Dutch privacy regulator, which is investigating the social network’s revamped privacy policy to see if it complies with the country’s tough data protection rules.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — United States tech giants can’t catch a break with Europe’s privacy watchdogs.

headline.main: Dutch Regulator Investigates Facebook’s Privacy Policy
